verses.name: Ezekiel 35:1
verses.text: Moreover the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:2
verses.text: Son of man, set thy face against mount Seir, and prophesy against it,

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:3
verses.text: And say unto it, Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, O mount Seir, I am against thee, and I will stretch out mine hand against thee, and I will make thee most desolate.

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:4
verses.text: I will lay thy cities waste, and thou shalt be desolate, and thou shalt know that I am the Lord.
